summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 16965 entitled: "An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 30th Avenue South from the south margin of Judkins Street to the north margin of Atlantic Street; Yakima Avenue, from the north margin of Judkins Street to the north margin of Atlantic Street; Judkins Street and Day Street, each from Yakima Avenue to 29th Avenue South, and Irving Street, from 29th Avenue South to 31st Avenue South; all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 576 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle."
